name: Alien Shooter: Vengeance
description:
Alien Shooter: Vengeance is an arcade game developed by Sigma Team. It was originally released in 2006. cdv Software Entertainment published the game. Alien Shooter: Vengeance has a Metascore of 67, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Alien Shooter: Vengeance is available on PC.
